name: SPLIT SCREEN ARENA
description:
Split Screen Arena is a 4 player split-screen competitive shooter in the vein of Quake 3 Arena and Unreal Tournament. It was made in 3 weeks for the Retro FPS game-jam hosted by JLaDaBoss. 

It features:

  • 4 player local split-screen deathmatch action
  • bots (if your buddies aren't around)
  • 6 different weapons

Note: This is the first project I've completed using Unity. There are probably bugs and egregious errors. Feel free to contact me or leave a comment if you have any constructive criticism.

**CONTROLLER REQUIRED** I am not a good enough programmer to make mouse & keyboard work. Sorry :(
